changelogversion.changelogtext: Minor stabilization improvements.
Automatic generation for most of the library dependencies.
Adding Material Design icons, palettes, and themes.
Design adjustments for the transaction entry form.
Standardizing icon size and color.
Improved styling for buttons.
Using switches in preference screens.
Redesigned Budget Edit screen.
Immediately apply changes to app language and colour theme.
Correcting a few minor issues.
Migrating existing database to the Database Metadata format.
Passcode improvements.
Storing remote change date per database file.
Removing minification to resolve issues on MIUI ROMs.
Updating used libraries.
Reducing the app file size.
Updating multiple libraries and adapting code.
Using delayed sync instead of upload to avoid conflicts.
Showing a notification on sync conflicts.
Showing a progress bar only when the database is being downloaded.
Correction: Processing recurring transaction after entry.
Rewriting the behaviour of the home screen on device rotation.
Using matching themes for date picker and calendar view.
Preview of the calendar view for recurring transactions.
Adding a sync indicator in the toolbar. Active only during synchronization.
Using a service for delayed upload to ensure execution.
Sync adjustment on start, not displaying the progressbar.
Adjustment for passcode on Android N (crypto provider is deprecated).
Faster file list retrieval from the cloud.
Additional stabilization through automated testing.
